About Me/Goals

I graduated from UC Santa Cruz with a B.S in Computer Science. Currently I work at a motorcycle company, Eaglerider, as a Jr. Project Manager for over four years. However I want to pursue a career as a software or web developer. I need a company that can help hone my development skills and put me on the right path of my career. My ultimate goal is to become a full stack developer.

During my free time, I continue to sharpen my web development skills by building beautiful, responsive websites using frameworks like ReactJS and TailwindCSS.

2015-2017
UC Santa Cruz

After transferring from a community college, I graduated after studying for 2 years.

2017-Present
Self Study

Despite graduating, I felt I needed to learn more so I dived into Android App development and published a few apps but realized the market is too saturated so I focused my time to web development.

2017-2018
FreeCodeCamp

I took this free online course for web development which estimated to be over 900 hours to complete. The course taught me everything regarding HTML, CSS, Boostrap, and Javascript. After completing the course, I earned a FreeCodeCamp certificate signifying all hard work I put into personal studying.

2017-Present
EagleRider

I found a job at a company called EagleRider as a Jr. Project Manager. This job taught me much about the employee boss relationship, communicating with my coworkers, double checking and completing important tasks. While I appreciate everything I learned, I believe my growth has stagnated and it is time for me to search for a job that can help me achieve my goal of becoming a full stack developer.
